mapper.insert: insert into comment (c_no, m_no, m_name, h_no, c_content, c_regdate, c_modifydate) values (comment_seq.nextval, #{c_no}, #{m_no}, #{m_name}, #{h_no}, #{c_content} );
mapper.update: update comment set c_content = #{c_content}, c_modifydate=sysdate where c_no=#{c_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where c_no=#{c_no}
select c_no, m_no, m_name, h_no, c_content, c_regdate, c_modifydate from comment where m_no=#{m_no} order by c_no desc
